T02D3376:52a-1: ma h'a pra ti s'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3376:52a-3: so so 'brang ba chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3376:52a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma so so 'brang ma chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3376:52a-5: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms
T02D3376:52a-6: pa'i rjes su aa las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3376:52a-7: 'khor la pram ser po sna tshogs kyi 'od zer
T02D3376:52a-8: spros pas gzhan gyi don byas nas yongs su gyur
T02D3376:52a-9: pa las bcom ldan 'das ma so so 'brang ba
T02D3376:52a-10: chen mo skad cig gis bskyed par bya ste /
T02D3376:52a-11: ser mo zhal bzhi pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D3376:52a-12: phyag brgyad ma zhal dang po ser po /
T02D3376:52a-14: nub phyogs kyi zhal sngo ba /
T02D3376:52a-16: g-yas pa'i phyag g-yas rnams na ral gri dang /
T02D3376:52a-23: rdo rje bsnams pa'i phyag go //
T02D3376:52a-24: sna tshogs kyi padma dang zla ba'i gdan la 'gying
T02D3376:52a-25: bag gis rnam par gnon cing yang dag par gnas
T02D3376:52a-26: pa'o // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po can /
T02D3376:52a-27: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3376:52a-28: sna tshogs kyi na bza' mnabs pa /
T02D3376:52a-29: gos kyi stod g-yogs byas pa /
T02D3376:52b-0: rin po che sna tshogs kyi @52b dbu rgyan can /
T02D3376:52b-1: de ltar rnam par bsams la /
T02D3376:52b-2: sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams su zla ba la gnas pa'i aom a'a:h'um dkar po dang /
T02D3376:52b-4: sngon po'i yi ge rnam par bsgom mo //
T02D3376:52b-5: de nas nu ma'i bar du zla ba la gnas pa'i pram yig rnam par bsams la /
T02D3376:52b-6: rnam pa sna tshogs pa lha mo rnams kyis bdag nyid la mchod par blta zhing /
T02D3376:52b-7: spro ba dang bsdu bas ji srid du skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3376:52b-8: skyo bar gyur na rang gi snying ga'i zla ba
T02D3376:52b-9: la sngags mu tig gi phreng ba'i rnam par bltas
T02D3376:52b-11: aom ma ni dha ri badzr'i ni ma h'a pra
T02D3376:52b-12: ti s'a re sv'a h'a zhes bya ba ni sngags
T02D3376:52b-13: so // so so 'brang ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3376:52b-14: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
